external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2022, January 27). Early Bird Catches the Wormhole: Observations from the StellarParticle Campaign. Retrieved February 7, 2022.

description: For the [SolarWinds Compromise](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0024), [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) conducted credential theft operations to obtain credentials to be used for access to victim environments.(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)
